e4acde7b-5fcb-4ced-abba-d9b1acd94cdf.name: Directional
e4acde7b-5fcb-4ced-abba-d9b1acd94cdf.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

a4d94213-092f-4c8a-a288-e4c66370a94e.name: Tough Skin
a4d94213-092f-4c8a-a288-e4c66370a94e.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

0bb99719-c378-477f-9a4f-1680a875ec6a.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

51ecc1f8-a0a2-4bcc-a6de-b2c03bc2600c.name: Oxygen Storage
51ecc1f8-a0a2-4bcc-a6de-b2c03bc2600c.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

afa31af4-dbad-44e7-b504-7c7f924d0bd7.name: Oxygen Storage
afa31af4-dbad-44e7-b504-7c7f924d0bd7.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

79f72a0b-0b4e-402b-93e2-a09cb444d883.name: Oxygen Storage
79f72a0b-0b4e-402b-93e2-a09cb444d883.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

bb8b4561-36cb-4082-9be7-1f6c535d06cd.name: Oxygen Storage
bb8b4561-36cb-4082-9be7-1f6c535d06cd.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

2d2f9dbf-c362-45eb-8dca-e61ca84a51e3.name: Oxygen Storage
2d2f9dbf-c362-45eb-8dca-e61ca84a51e3.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

85315e14-db6b-43da-b604-a2a50bc501af.name: Diffuse
85315e14-db6b-43da-b604-a2a50bc501af.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

a9f474fd-a67e-42ed-be1c-7f978771775c.name: Homogenous
a9f474fd-a67e-42ed-be1c-7f978771775c.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

1d5b92e2-bc17-41d9-9081-d0f922620f49.name: No Blood
1d5b92e2-bc17-41d9-9081-d0f922620f49.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

1b975bc9-671a-4fbf-b287-4584cebd5deb.name: No Brain
1b975bc9-671a-4fbf-b287-4584cebd5deb.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

91ea81f7-045f-4be4-b027-f56ae18bd6f3.name: No Eyes
91ea81f7-045f-4be4-b027-f56ae18bd6f3.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d88970fd-61c1-422b-930a-2816c4f9ca9b.name: No Head
d88970fd-61c1-422b-930a-2816c4f9ca9b.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

07b47775-6d50-4fce-b2bb-da8978bd59c3.name: No Neck
07b47775-6d50-4fce-b2bb-da8978bd59c3.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

a23c9794-1d55-49a6-bac2-d05f37e6cb43.name: No Vitals
a23c9794-1d55-49a6-bac2-d05f37e6cb43.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

558a0b50-bef2-4eca-b40f-d9672ef882b3.name: Unliving
558a0b50-bef2-4eca-b40f-d9672ef882b3.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
